00014 #ifndef _UPK_PROTOCOL_H
00015 #define _UPK_PROTOCOL_H

00036 #include "upk_error.h"
00037 #include "upk_types.h"
00038 
00039 /* ********************************************************************************************************************
00040    enums must preserve order. To add support for a new protocol version, create a new vN interface, add whatever
00041    additional fields necessary to a vN_protocol_structs.h and append the macro in the appropriate location here.  and
00042    add the version specific items to the switch in upk_protocol.c. Note that the underlying protocol does _not_ need to
00043    maintain anything as a subset; just the wrapper function must support old and new styles.  this allows for controlled 
00044    deprecation, while still providing protocol and API compatibility.
00045    ******************************************************************************************************************* */
00046 
00047 #define UPK_MAX_PACKET_SIZE 65536                          
00048 #define UPK_PACKET_HEADER_LEN 16
00049 #define UPK_PACKET_FOOTER_LEN 4
00050 
00051 #define UPK_MIN_SUPPORTED_PROTO 0
00052 #define UPK_MAX_SUPPORTED_PROTO 0
00053 
00054 #define UPK_DATA __upk_data
00055 #define UPK_DATA_PTR __upk_data_ptr
00056 #define UPK_DATA_LEN __upk_data_len
00057 #define UPK_BUF __upk_buf
00058 #define UPK_BUF_PTR __upk_buf_ptr
00059 #define UPK_UINT8_BUFFER __upk_uint8_buf
00060 #define UPK_UINT16_BUFFER __upk_uint16_buf
00061 #define UPK_UINT32_BUFFER __upk_uint32_buf
00062 #define UPK_STRING_LENGTH __upk_string_len
00063 
00064 /* XXX you will want to redefine these depending on the type of data you're dealing with */
00065 #define UPK_MSG_IDENTIFIER_TYPEDEF upk_pkttype_t
00066 #define UPK_MSG_IDENTIFIER pkttype
00067 
00068 #define UPK_INIT_DESERIALIZE(TYPE) \
00069     TYPE * UPK_DATA = NULL; \
00070     unsigned char * UPK_BUF_PTR = UPK_BUF; \
00071     uint32_t UPK_UINT32_BUFFER = 0; \
00072     uint16_t UPK_UINT16_BUFFER = 0; \
00073     uint8_t UPK_UINT8_BUFFER = 0; \
00074     UPK_UINT32_BUFFER = UPK_UINT32_BUFFER + 0; \
00075     UPK_UINT16_BUFFER = UPK_UINT16_BUFFER + 0; \
00076     UPK_UINT8_BUFFER = UPK_UINT8_BUFFER + 0
00077 
00078 
00079 #define UPK_MEMB_TO_LEN(MEMB) MEMB ## _len
00080 
00081 #define UPK_INIT_DESERIALIZE_MSG(TYPE) \
00082     UPK_INIT_DESERIALIZE(TYPE); \
00083     UPK_DATA = calloc(1,sizeof(*UPK_DATA)); \
00084     UPK_FETCH_ENUM(UPK_MSG_IDENTIFIER_TYPEDEF, UPK_MSG_IDENTIFIER)
00085 
00086 #define UPK_FETCH_UINT32_T(TYPE,MEMB) \
00087     memcpy(&UPK_UINT32_BUFFER, UPK_BUF_PTR, sizeof(UPK_UINT32_BUFFER)); \
00088     UPK_DATA->MEMB = (TYPE) ntohl( UPK_UINT32_BUFFER ); \
00089     UPK_BUF_PTR += sizeof(UPK_UINT32_BUFFER)
00090 
00091 #define UPK_FETCH_UINT32(MEMB) \
00092     UPK_FETCH_UINT32_T(uint32_t, MEMB)
00093 
00094 #define UPK_FETCH_UINT16_T(TYPE,MEMB) \
00095     memcpy(&UPK_UINT16_BUFFER, UPK_BUF_PTR, sizeof(UPK_UINT16_BUFFER)); \
00096     UPK_DATA->MEMB = (TYPE) ntohs( UPK_UINT16_BUFFER ); \
00097     UPK_BUF_PTR += sizeof(UPK_UINT16_BUFFER)
00098 
00099 #define UPK_FETCH_UINT16(MEMB) \
00100     UPK_FETCH_UINT16_T(uint16_t, MEMB)
00101 
00102 #define UPK_FETCH_UINT8_T(TYPE,MEMB) \
00103     memcpy(&UPK_UINT8_BUFFER, UPK_BUF_PTR, sizeof(UPK_UINT8_BUFFER)); \
00104     UPK_DATA->MEMB = (TYPE) UPK_UINT8_BUFFER; \
00105     UPK_BUF_PTR += sizeof(UPK_UINT8_BUFFER)
00106 
00107 #define UPK_FETCH_UINT8(MEMB) \
00108     UPK_FETCH_UINT8_T(uint8_t, MEMB)
00109 
00110 #define UPK_FETCH_BOOL(MEMB) \
00111     UPK_FETCH_UINT8_T(bool, MEMB)
00112 
00113 #define UPK_FETCH_ENUM(TYPE,MEMB) \
00114     UPK_FETCH_UINT32_T(TYPE, MEMB)
00115 
00116 #define UPK_FETCH_STRING(MEMB) \
00117     /* memset(UPK_DATA->MEMB,0,sizeof(UPK_DATA->MEMB)); */ \
00118     /* UPK_DATA->MEMB = calloc(1, UPK_DATA->UPK_MEMB_TO_LEN(MEMB) + 1);  * null terminate */ \
00119     memcpy(UPK_DATA->MEMB, UPK_BUF_PTR, UPK_DATA->UPK_MEMB_TO_LEN(MEMB)); \
00120     UPK_BUF_PTR += UPK_DATA->UPK_MEMB_TO_LEN(MEMB)
00121 
00122 #define UPK_FETCH_DATA_TO_BUF(BUF, LEN) \
00123     BUF = calloc(1, UPK_DATA->LEN); \
00124     memcpy(BUF, UPK_BUF_PTR, UPK_DATA->LEN); \
00125     UPK_BUF_PTR += UPK_DATA->LEN
00126 
00127 #define UPK_FETCH_DATA(MEMB) \
00128     UPK_FETCH_DATA_TO_BUF(UPK_DATA->MEMB, UPK_MEMB_TO_LEN(MEMB))
00129 
00130 #define UPK_FETCH_ARRAY(MEMB, LEN) \
00131     memcpy(UPK_DATA->MEMB, UPK_BUF_PTR, LEN); \
00132     UPK_BUF_PTR += LEN
00133 
00134 #define UPK_INIT_SERIALIZE(TYPE) \
00135     TYPE * UPK_DATA = (TYPE *) UPK_DATA_PTR; \
00136     upk_pkt_buf_t * UPK_BUF = NULL; \
00137     upk_pkt_buf_t * UPK_BUF_PTR = NULL; \
00138     uint32_t UPK_UINT32_BUFFER = 0; \
00139     uint16_t UPK_UINT16_BUFFER = 0; \
00140     uint8_t UPK_UINT8_BUFFER = 0; \
00141     size_t UPK_STRING_LENGTH = 0; \
00142     UPK_UINT32_BUFFER = UPK_UINT32_BUFFER + 0; \
00143     UPK_UINT16_BUFFER = UPK_UINT16_BUFFER + 0; \
00144     UPK_UINT8_BUFFER = UPK_UINT8_BUFFER + 0; \
00145     UPK_STRING_LENGTH = UPK_STRING_LENGTH + 0
00146 
00147 #define UPK_INIT_SERIALIZE_BUF(TYPE, LEN) \
00148     UPK_INIT_SERIALIZE(TYPE); \
00149     UPK_BUF = calloc(1, LEN); \
00150     UPK_BUF_PTR = UPK_BUF
00151 
00152 #define UPK_INIT_SERIALIZE_MSG(TYPE) \
00153     UPK_INIT_SERIALIZE_BUF(TYPE, UPK_DATA_LEN); \
00154     UPK_PUT_ENUM(UPK_MSG_IDENTIFIER)
00155 
00156 #define UPK_PUT_UINT32(MEMB) \
00157     UPK_UINT32_BUFFER = htonl( (uint32_t) UPK_DATA->MEMB ); \
00158     memcpy(UPK_BUF_PTR, &UPK_UINT32_BUFFER, sizeof(UPK_UINT32_BUFFER)); \
00159     UPK_BUF_PTR += sizeof(UPK_UINT32_BUFFER)
00160 
00161 #define UPK_PUT_UINT16(MEMB) \
00162     UPK_UINT16_BUFFER = htons( (uint16_t) UPK_DATA->MEMB ); \
00163     memcpy(UPK_BUF_PTR, &UPK_UINT16_BUFFER, sizeof(UPK_UINT16_BUFFER)); \
00164     UPK_BUF_PTR += sizeof(UPK_UINT16_BUFFER)
00165 
00166 #define UPK_PUT_UINT8(MEMB) \
00167     UPK_UINT8_BUFFER = (uint8_t) UPK_DATA->MEMB; \
00168     memcpy(UPK_BUF_PTR, &UPK_UINT8_BUFFER, sizeof(UPK_UINT8_BUFFER)); \
00169     UPK_BUF_PTR += sizeof(UPK_UINT8_BUFFER)
00170 
00171 #define UPK_PUT_BOOL(MEMB) \
00172     UPK_PUT_UINT8(MEMB)
00173 
00174 #define UPK_PUT_ENUM(MEMB) \
00175     UPK_PUT_UINT32(MEMB)
00176 
00177 #define UPK_PUT_STRING(MEMB) \
00178     UPK_STRING_LENGTH = strnlen(UPK_DATA->MEMB, UPK_MAX_STRING_LEN); \
00179     memcpy(UPK_BUF_PTR, UPK_DATA->MEMB, strnlen(UPK_DATA->MEMB, UPK_STRING_LENGTH)); \
00180     UPK_BUF_PTR += UPK_STRING_LENGTH
00181 
00182 #define UPK_PUT_DATA_FROM_BUF(BUF, LEN) \
00183     memcpy(UPK_BUF_PTR, BUF, UPK_DATA->LEN); \
00184     UPK_BUF_PTR += UPK_DATA->LEN
00185 
00186 #define UPK_PUT_DATA(MEMB) \
00187     UPK_PUT_DATA_FROM_BUF(UPK_DATA->MEMB, UPK_MEMB_TO_LEN(MEMB))
00188 
00189 #define UPK_PUT_ARRAY(MEMB, LEN) \
00190     memcpy(UPK_BUF_PTR, UPK_DATA->MEMB, LEN); \
00191     UPK_BUF_PTR += LEN
00192 
00193 #ifdef __NEVERDEFINED_NEED_FOR_AUTOSCAN_TO_SEE_FUNCS_USED_IN_ABOVE_MACROS
00194 static inline void
00195 __never_compiled(void)
00196 {
00197     void                   *foo, *bar;
00198     int32_t                 baz = 1;
00199 
00200     foo = calloc(1, sizeof(int32_t));
00201     bar = calloc(1, sizeof(int32_t));
00202     memcpy(foo, bar, sizeof(int32_t));
00203     baz = strnlen("foobar", 64);
00204     baz = htonl(baz);
00205     baz = ntohl(baz);
00206     baz = (int32_t) htons((int16_t) baz);
00207     baz = (int32_t) ntohs((int16_t) baz);
00208 }
00209 #endif

00235 typedef enum _upk_msgtype {

00274     UPK_PUB_PUBLICATION = 8192,                            
00277     UPK_PUB_CANCELATION,                                   
00280     UPK_PUB_V0_PROTO_LIMIT,                                
00282     UPK_PUB_LIMIT,                                         
00283 } upk_msgtype_t;
00284 
00285 #define UPK_N_SUPPORTED_PROTOS (1 + UPK_MAX_SUPPORTED_PROTO - UPK_MIN_SUPPORTED_PROTO)
00286 #define _UPK_N_PER_TYPE(A) (UPK_##A##_LIMIT - UPK_##A##_ORIGIN - UPK_N_SUPPORTED_PROTOS)
00287 #define UPK_N_REQ_TYPES _UPK_N_PER_TYPE(REQ)
00288 #define UPK_N_REPL_TYPES _UPK_N_PER_TYPE(REPL)
00289 #define UPK_N_PUB_TYPES _UPK_N_PER_TYPE(PUB)
00290 
00291 #define _UPK_MSGTYPE_OFFSET(V,A,B) (V < UPK_##A##_LIMIT) ? (V - UPK_##A##_ORIGIN) + B
00292 #define UPK_MSGTYPE_IDX(MSGTYPE) \
00293     ( _UPK_MSGTYPE_OFFSET(MSGTYPE,REQ,0) : _UPK_MSGTYPE_OFFSET(MSGTYPE,REPL,UPK_N_REQ_TYPES) : \
00294     _UPK_MSGTYPE_OFFSET(MSGTYPE,PUB,UPK_N_REQ_TYPES+UPK_N_REPL_TYPES) : -1 )
00295
